summary: The Equal Access to Abortion Coverage in Health Insurance Act of 2025 (EACH Act of 2025) aims to ensure affordable abortion coverage and care for every person. It mandates abortion services coverage for individuals insured by or receiving care from federal health programs and plans, and prohibits restrictions on private insurance coverage of abortion services. The bill repeals a section of the Affordable Care Act related to abortion restrictions, and seeks to eliminate all government-imposed barriers to abortion access.
